stories.text:
It's getting frustrating for me, I read every day an attack on non-vaccinated, then some world champion just travels around quietly, I have a family member who last year got the whole activity closed because of a positive staff member, while football teams gets surgically quarantined and the rest can still go to away games with public transport without issues, I see companies who can break the law undisturbed towards the powerless because it happens so many times that people isn't going to be able to afford all the lawyers that are required for all the unjustice events...

We are limited and as a majority I am not sure how to make the less wealthy respected enough without universal access to lawyers and subsidized costs, because if price is a barrier entry then there is nothing else than the less wealthy being unrepresented, what do you think?
stories.title: Sk HN: Do you think wealthy live in a different society and the law is limited?
